item.title: Rubbish, 9th November
item.description:

item.title: Outside Lemoge Clinic (manhole on the road), 9th November
item.description:
Brent Council replied to me saying that this falls under Camden. Camden are saying that this falls under Brent. Please help as I want to escalate the issue. It seems that both local authorities are passing on responsibility to the other one. In the meantime the noise is extremely disturbing and our sleep interrupted.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kilburn High Road, Kilburn, London
Report on FixMyStreet
